reset_last_run_dates.name: Reset last run dates
reset_last_run_dates.description: Clear stored last-run dates so the next daily run will try donate/VIP/credit again. Use when "Already donated" is wrong.

user.title: MAM Manager
user.description: Connect to MyAnonamouse. **User ID** and **MAM session cookie** are required (for stats, credits and VIP) and must be entered manually. **Username** and **Password** are optional (for auto-donate only); if provided we verify login before saving.

data_description.user_id: Your MAM user ID (numeric). Required for stats, credits and VIP.
data_description.mam_id: Session cookie from your browser. Required for stats, credits and VIP.
data_description.username: MAM login email. Optional; required for auto-donate to vault.
data_description.password: MAM login password. Optional; required for auto-donate. Only first 5 characters shown in options.

error.cannot_connect: Could not connect to MAM. Check user ID and cookie, or username and password.
error.invalid_user_id: User ID must be a number.
error.missing_credentials: User ID and session cookie are required. Enter them manually (from your browser after logging in to MAM).
error.invalid_auth: Login failed. Check username and password.
error.user_id_required: We could not detect your user ID. Please enter your MAM user ID (numeric).
